trans-unit.source: If punyverse does not work, try upgrading your graphics card drivers.
trans-unit.target: If punyverse does not work, try upgrading your graphics card drivers.

trans-unit.source: If the problem is unrelated to your graphics card, and it persists, try running punyverse under debug mode. To do this, run punyverse as punyverse --debug. Then paste the entirety of the output into a new GitHub issue here.
trans-unit.target: If the problem is unrelated to your graphics card, and it persists, try running punyverse under debug mode. To do this, run punyverse as punyverse --debug . Then paste the entirety of the output into a new GitHub issue here.

trans-unit.source: If you are on Windows, run punyverse_make_launcher. This should create special launchers that runs punyverse on your dedicated graphics card, should it exist.
trans-unit.target: If you are on Windows, run punyverse_make_launcher . This should create special launchers that runs punyverse on your dedicated graphics card, should it exist.

trans-unit.source: If your graphics card does not appear to support OpenGL 3.3, then you cannot run the latest version of punyverse. You can try pip install -U punyverse==0.5 to install the last version of punyverse to support legacy devices. You can download the wheels manually from the PyPI page.
trans-unit.target: If your graphics card does not appear to support OpenGL 3.3, then you cannot run the latest version of punyverse . You can try pip install -U punyverse==0.5 to install the last version of punyverse to support legacy devices. You can download the wheels manually from the PyPI page.

trans-unit.source: Python simulator of a puny universe.
trans-unit.target: Simulador pitón de un universo enclenque.

trans-unit.source: Python simulator of a puny universe. (How many words can I stick into one?)
trans-unit.target: Simulador pitón de un universo insignificante.(¿Cuántas palabras puedo meter en una?)

trans-unit.source: Then, run punyverse to launch the simulator, or punyversew to launch without the console.
trans-unit.target: Then, run punyverse to launch the simulator, or punyversew to launch without the console.

trans-unit.source: Your graphics card might not support some of the larger textures used by punyverse, and so startup might fail. To solve this problem, run punyverse_small_images. It will do nothing if your graphics card supports all the textures, so when in doubt, run punyverse_small_images after installation.
trans-unit.target: Your graphics card might not support some of the larger textures used by punyverse , and so startup might fail. To solve this problem, run punyverse_small_images . It will do nothing if your graphics card supports all the textures, so when in doubt, run punyverse_small_images after installation.
